body: Never can understand why the hell that people who hate a certain genre come to that genre knowing full well that it is that genre because of the tag only the then bitch about having to read said genre and how it sucks. Like jeez how about just not reading it and moving on with your life and find something you enjoy. Like I for one am not into these weight gain hentai. So you know what anytime I end up clicking on one and seeing weight gain in the genre I just hit the back button on my laptop and move on with my life without reading a single page of it. It's that easy people to avoid a genre you don't like.

A friend in the complex sees this guy vising her everyday when the husband is at work. Asks his wife how was your day? She lies. Goes to the bank and finds out he leaves for lunch and comes back around the same time when seen near his apt complex.  Buys small hidden cameras and places all around the house. Gets an alert and turns them on and they are recording. Calls wife and guy makes her answer and he watches her talk to him while she is having sex. After over a week of recordings he has his wife come with him to the bank with a lawyer and asks for meeting also with the president of bank.  Everything is exposed. Guy is fined and blackmailed from working in finance, divorces wife, and gets compilations from both. Oh, and he starts dating someone from work.
